import React, { useState} from 'react' import { MenuIcon, UserIcon, XIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' const LoginBar = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => setMenu(!menu); return (
{/* When menu is clicked, transform into x icon */} {!menu ? : }
{/* Display Menu for smaller screens */}
{/* If screen is lg(>1024 px w), menu icon should be changed to search icon. Hide menu when this happens */}
) } export default LoginBar
